alert.note: Alert for Coastal Ocean; Ocean; Southeastern Burlington (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 19 at 10:20PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Ocean and east central Burlington Counties through 1045 PM EDT... At 1019 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Warren Grove, or 18 miles southwest of Toms River, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Barnegat, Surf City, Brookville, Warren Grove, Beach Haven West, Manahawkin, Ocean Acres and Waretown. This includes Garden State Parkway between mile markers 57 and 76. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
